t: Amazon.com: World of Nintendo 2.5" Goomba Action Figure : Video Games
s: Traitorous mushrooms that turned against the Mushroom Kingdom and defected to join Bowser's army, the Goomba holds the distinction of being the first baddie encountered in the first Super Mario Bros game but the last developed for the game. Weak, they can be taken out with a single jump.

t: Amazon.com: Little Buddy 1245 Super Mario Series Goomba 12" Plush : Toys & Games
s: Goombas are a fictional species of sentient mushrooms from Nintendo's Mario franchise. They first appeared in the NES video game Super Mario Bros. as the first enemy players encounter. They have appeared outside of video games, including in film, television and other media.
